text: Abacionidae is a family of crested millipedes in the order Callipodida. There are at least three genera and about 13 described species in Abacionidae. ==Genera== * Abacion Rafinesque, 1820 * Delophon Chamberlin, 1943 * Tetracion Hoffman, 1956 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Callipodida Category:Millipede families
title: Abacionidae
